item.title: CVE-2023-45053|2024-08-02T20:14:19.312Z -- pluginever -- wp%20content%20pilot%20%E2%80%93%20autoblogging%20%26%20affiliate%20marketing%20plugin
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in pluginever WP Content Pilot – Autoblogging & Affiliate Marketing Plugin allows Code Injection.This issue affects WP Content Pilot – Autoblogging & Affiliate Marketing Plugin: from n/a through 1.3.3.
